creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: cream colored carton with tan stripes; wooden box with inscription on inside and outside of lid; wrapped in tissue; gold fabric; image of landscape with mountains in distance, rivers and small buildings; small bridge in LR and a lone figure on top of a hill in the center
inscription: 一幅雲煙　奪化工閒　來逸奧與　誰同吾家　畫訣如拜　問坐在圖　書萬卷中 (A hanging scroll of cloud and mist, / snatching the Creator\'s work! / Serene, I come here:  transcendent mystery— / with whom may I share it? / If someone should inquire about the secrets / of my \"school of painting:\" / Just sit here, in the middle of / ten thousand volumes of books!) [Jonathan Chaves]
markings:
poem UR red seal: 師在我 {shi zai ga}; poem LL red seals: 字曰子徳 {azana iwaku Shitoku}, 静處 {seisho} [seisho #3]; LRC: 冬日到門惟白雲 {shūjitsu tada shirakumo kado ni itaru}
